reviewDescription: We liked our first purchase enough to purchase them again.  The second purchase has been disappointing for two reasons. The first negative is these brushes leak so it’s like brushing with a water pick.  The second negative is my first brush chewed up my gum in the first week.  I did replace it with another brush and it didn’t tear up my gums.We have two Oral B brushes and both leak while you brush a lot with the new tips. To be fair I have not contacted the manufacturer but when I do I will update my comments to reflect their input

reviewTitle: Not sure how authentic these are
reviewDescription: I love putting new toothbrush heads on so I wanted to buy 4 at a time. I have bought them physically in the store before and had no issues. When these came they were a little sketch. The packaging wasn't the best and they had a strong smell that was not very good. I will not purchase these again.

reviewTitle: Newer version does not work with older models
reviewDescription: Some vendors are selling the newer model under the listing for the old one. The newer model does not work on the older model handle (type 3709). If you have an older model toothbrush, be sure you get the older model heads. The differences are (see photos)1. The colored circle comes attached in the newer model and unattached in the older.2. The newer model is number 99372244. The older model is 4704132-00.If you use the newer model on the older brush, the fit is bad. The whole brush shakes instead of just the head. Two of them broke within 2 days. Returned them and received the older model, which are working flawlessly.

Toothbrush was great when we first got it. Everything worked as it should and it definitely provides a much better clean than traditional toothbrushes (girlfriend used to get a lot of tooth infections - she didn't get any using this).However after less than 5 months of normal use the thing stopped holding charge and then just died. RIP toothbrush. I know it's a cheaper model but I feel like it should last longer than 5 months.I mean 1 year is a stretch but would 6 months be too much to ask for? Oh well, guess I'll have to buy another. Maybe the more expensive one will last longer?

Great price made me buy these Cross Action replacement heads. Unfortunately, they do not work with my toothbrush. Not sure why but maybe it has something to do with the fact they are made in a different country so the specs may not be the same. Pretty disappointing. Didn't say that they were made elsewhere or wouldn't fit American products.

Have just had it under a month. Will have to come back after I go to my dentist for the 6 month cleaning for a final review. So far the only issue is it’s hard to turn off and on. I press on the circle but nothing happens, I have to slide my finger down below that circle a little. I like the feature how it lets you know it’s time to move to the next section of your teeths better than the Phillip’s electric toothbrush I had
I am returning these brush heads because I don’t think they will fit my toothbrush. It’s difficult to tell because the packaging was written in a foreign language that I can’t read!

reviewTitle: Possibly legit, but definitely from a different country
reviewDescription: The brush heads look exactly like the one that came with my toothbrush and they fit fine. The packaging is mostly in Turkish (I think?). Not a big deal for me, but it might bother others and it'd be nice if it said somewhere on Amazon that these aren't from the US when buying from the US site.

The text on the package is completely in German, no English.  Are these brush heads legit Oral B, I guess only time will tell!  I tried them on my Oral B electric toothbrush and the seem to fit good.  Brush heads seem to be of similar design to the Oral B style that I currently have.
Well made but the bristles are quite hard. I’m a daily flosser but this bristle has destroyed my gums a bit

As a follow-up - the other brush heads in the package were faulty. Sometimes of the stems fit,  but brush head, which seemed to fit the stem, would loosen from the stem to the point of falling off the stem!  Others were as listed in my first review below.I’ve been using these for about three years.  However this time, though I’m still using the same electric toothbrush, the brush stem is too loose for the toothbrush - they wiggle off while I brush - and the head wiggles and, if I’m not extremely careful, pinches my inner lips.  I’m hoping the other brush heads in this pack fit better and that this is just a fluke as the brushes are too expensive to just throw away.

reviewTitle: Fake oral b. Different from sold by Amazon one and head fell apart

reviewDescription: First of all it took like two weeks for me to receive this AND the packaging looked sus with all sorts of foreign language on it not the usual way things are labeled these days also , they fit but they don’t … it’s like the slots in the inside of the brush head are opposite the original one I have after purchasing my toothbrush which it came with . I’m going to return .

reviewTitle: Brush head got loosen an injured my lips
reviewDescription: I received the oral B replacement brushes with the  package crashed. I was going to return the package then I thought the tooth brushes inside seemed to be ok so I decided not to bother.  I have been using the brush for a few weeks then my lips kept getting caught and pinched badly. I took a look a the brush and I realized the head got loosen up and created a space in between the brush and the handle.  I highly doubt this is an authentic product.  The print of "Oral B" getting blurred too.  My lips are in serious pain, not recommend!

reviewTitle: Not the same as before. Cheap.
reviewDescription: I’ve bought these toothbrush heads for years. This is the first time we’ve had problems with them. They’re cheap. The quality is not the same. My husbands has replaced his twice in one week and both (same package) are not spinning like they’re supposed to. I do like that the detached colored ring is no more. Now they’re are individually colored, but the quality is not good.

I have used these heads/toothbrush for years. I loved the heads as they were stiff and cleaned very well. This last batch of heads I received is a joke, one head lasted three days before the head stopped spilling and broke. I’m constantly being pinched by the spilling head due to the cheaper build quality. It’s really a shame they had to change these heads, because I loved them so much before.

I just got them today so I can’t say how they work, I’m sure they’ll be ok , they’re just tooth brushes. My problem is that they came in loose already opened packaging, the oral b logo on them are stripped and rubbing off, and the brushes themselves aren’t the same as the original, dull coloring and bristles don’t look the same, seems like a knock off, not an authentic oral b product.

After years of ordering Oral-B replacement heads with no complaint, this latest batch is very inferior.  We usually don't check the origin of the product, if it looks like the ones we always order, but will be more careful in the future.  The heads slide off of the brush holder, the tops wobble very loosely in your mouth and generally are not secure on the unit.  3 out of the 4 are unusable.

These are knock off brush heads.  The packaging of the individual brushes are not well sealed, the paper lifts right off the plastic.  The logo comes right off and looks different from the original oral b ones that came with the toothbrush.  Will not order again, and these were listed in the Oral B store on Amazon. In the picture the real brush is on the left, the one I ordered on Amazon on the right.

I have been looking for a good price on Oral B replacement brushes but was leary to try these because I wasn't sure they would fit. The description said the product fit all Oral B electric toothbrushes. Well, the brushes I received were Oral B but there was no way that they would fit. Before purchase I read the questions. One person asked it the brushes would fit model number 3757, which is the same brush I have. The answer was yes. I don't see how that's possible since it didn't fit mine. Very disappointed.

reviewTitle: Three heads included, box and order said four.
reviewDescription: The box and order said 4 heads included;  only 3 were in the box and there was no evidence that the box had been tampered with. That is why I am only rating this product as a 3.
Toothbrush works well. I replaced a previous model with this one Only problem is prior model had a rubber grip. This has only a modeled plastic grip that tends to slip out of your hand
Non-English packaging (seller: MAH Retail). Seems to be the actual Oral B brand, but packaged for sale outside the United States.
These are not real oral-b brush heads. They fit a little tight and the bands that fit around the bottom broke after a couple of weeks use. Other than that they work as they should.

I like the way the Oral-B cleans, but the toothpaste/saliva runs down your arms and all over the toothbrush.  No matter how I held it, it was very messy.  I don't like that, but was very impressed with how my teeth felt after brushing.

I ordered a package of four and only received a package of two. Amazon is crediting half the money, but I have to apply to another Amazon purchase. I feel duped. That being said, I love the product itself. Huge difference in how clean my teeth feel now.

reviewTitle: Not happy with these brush head
reviewDescription: They are too soft to remove the stains from your teeth , some other heads have plastic rubber to have a better contact with your teeth
it's better than the regular ones, but not great--doesn't last long and leaves some debris between the teeth.the mad hatter

reviewTitle: Not the packaging as pictured - not for American market
These brushes are a good value for the price.
reviewDescription: The toothbrushes seem weak. Usually when I get these brushes from the grocery store, the first 0  or so uses, the brushes are very firm. These brushes were soft from the start. The price is unbeatable.

I have ordered these toothbrushes twice before.  This time I received knock offs.  The bristles on the brushes were a different color.Braun has  blue bristles that turn light when it’s time to change your toothbrush.  The writing on the package was in foreign languages.None of them English!  I’m sending the package back.  I don’t want any substitutes.

reviewTitle: Caution: Product does not match description of listing
reviewDescription: The product description and images listed are NOT the product received. Packaging is not in English, and does not match the official product found in stores. Use caution as this does not appear to be an official product, and the listing is misleading.

I just purchased a pack of 4 on 10/12/22 and received them 10/14/22 and am already on my third brushhead.  That's less than 3 months.  The brush head has broken off the shaft each time.  I would NOT purchase these again.  Very disappointing.

These are breaking in less than a month. The joint that swivels back and forth gets loose and it is no longer able to complete its back and forth brushing action when you apply it to your teeth. You'll end up just brushing your teeth manually...

I didn’t mind that the package was labeled in a foreign language. Unfortunately tho there is only a 30 day return window.  This worked fine for about 2 months, then it would just stop whenever it touched teeth. I put in new batteries but it didn’t fix the problem. Runs fine but as soon as you actually use it it shuts off. So basically it’s a waste of money.

There's an angled ridge at the bottom of the brush which rubs against the inside of my lips and occasionally cuts/irritates them. Maybe this is just an issue for larger people but it's super frustrating, and I don't even understand why it's there.

reviewTitle: Ordered  "Amazon's Choice" 4 pack got a two pack, instructions in four foreign languages, no English
reviewDescription: Needed replacement brush heads for my Oral-B 1000. Read many reviews  warning of foreign knock-offs. Trying to to play it safe by ordering "Amazon's choice".  product arrived with a barcode clearly stating 4 brush heads. Package itself clearly showing two brush heads. Package had four languages, none of them English. I am beyond disappointed.

reviewTitle: Doesn't Seem Like a Genuine Oral B
reviewDescription: I've ordered from this seller twice before and the replacement brush heads seemed fine. This time, the packaging is written in Spanish and the brush heads are different than Oral B heads. Since I live in the states, this packaging seems suspicious.

The box it was shipped in was dry. There is moisture inside the sealed package of toothbrush heads. I opened the package and the individually packaged heads were wet. They are in a plastic package with a paper type backing that was very wet. Each toothbrush head has a strange smell as well. I will sanitize them maybe or just toss them
I rarely write reviews.  But it was a surprise to receive a non-original product of such poor quality.The difference between the used one and the new product is visible to the naked eye.

The toothbrush heads I received look like knockoff. They made a weird noise in the toothbrush. Multiple languages in the package. Appears to be repackaged. The item that is pictured is not what you received.

Full package display shows very little English language.  This is not the same product featured in the local, or even regional drugstore.  On the basis of deceptive advertising, I wouldn’t recommend this product or vendor

reviewTitle: Package came in a different language.
reviewDescription: I have no idea what I actually bought since I can’t read the language. The picture I thought I was buying is completely different. I don’t believe these are true Oral B brush heads. Returned

i wanted to return the product after the first use bc of the terrible noise but i didn't bc of the good reviews but now after maybe a month its working maybe for a minuet and then shot off ,have to charge it again for 24 hour. Very bad product!!!!!!!!
For some reason, these brush heads are larger than the one my Oral B crossaction toothbrush came with and they hurt. They feel more abrasive. I just ordered different ones to see if they help.
Items shows Turkish, the paint seems lighter than my original oral-B product, not authenticate, why Amazon sells other countries products in the US?

reviewTitle: Oral B is a great line.
reviewDescription: I'm sure the brushes are good quality, but I gave this a 1 start because I never received my package.

reviewTitle: Awful brushes! Do not clean your teeth at all!
reviewDescription: These brushes are absolutely terrible!! They are no better than having a cheap $5 battery operated toothbrush. All these brushes do is vibrate; therefore, they do not clean. Wish I had not let the return window close, otherwise, they would be going back! Live and learn.
Not even close.  German packaging.  Doesn't include the blue indicator bristles.  Clearly made for a different market. Spend the extra money and get the real product.
This lasted a little over a month, then it quit charging. What a waste of money. Won’t be purchasing an Oral B product again.
Excellent.

Buying these on Amazon kinda sucks. I didn't want to buy the knock-off brand ones (since teeth are more important than saving a few bucks) so I wanted the official Oral-B ones but many reviews mention receiving counterfeits from the official listing. I wasted so much time trying to figure out which listings and sellers were legitimate and which were counterfeit. Why is it so hard to buy an authetic Oral-B brush head on Amazon?I finally took a leap and ordered from a seller with good feedback (Mitch Mel Corp). Thankfully I didn't get a counterfeit one. The pack of 4 I got was definitely a legit Oral-B one. The brush heads look and fit exactly the same as the one that came with my electric toothbrush (I have the Black 1000 one). I tried one and it worked perfectly.Glad I managed to get authetic ones from Amazon. The price isn't as good as the knockoff ones but like I said, your teeth is more valuable than saving a few bucks. A little expensive but worth the price.

reviewTitle: That the product is available through Amazon.
reviewDescription: I’ve used an electric toothbrush for years so the replacements availability was important to me. I’m fact, I need to purchase more of them in the near future.
These fit the oral B electric toothbrush that I have.

I have been using these replacement brushes for a long time.  I like that they are authentic Oral B brushes.  They are very durable, never had problems with bristles falling out or the brush breaking.  They fit the Oral B electric toothbrush perfectly.  They are a great value. I replace them every six months as suggested by my dentist and they always last that long.  I highly recommend these replacement brushes.

reviewTitle: I Look Forward to Brushing My Teeth!
reviewDescription: This toothbrush  was purchased to replace my dear old Sonicare, which had died after many years of service. I switched brands with some trepidation, but to my delight and surprise, my new Oral-B has taken oral hygiene to a new level. I love the way the brush head massages my gums - it is soothing and quite pleasurable. Because of the smaller size of the brush head, it is much easier to reach all tooth surfaces. My mouth feels cleaner and healthier because of the gentle circulatory boost on my gums and the ability to more thoroughly reach all surfaces. Now, it makes a lot of noise - like a lawn mower heard through a window - but I do not care! The brushing results are superb.

I’ve always been a fan of Oral B toothbrushes. My last one having survived for 6 years.I wanted a mid range brush as I couldn’t justify To myself paying triple digits for a toothbrush.Having looked at a lot or reviews for various brushes I settled on this one. I’m not sure why there are so many reviews of people whining about the vibration of the brush on their teeth, it’s an electric toothbrush not a feather !Personally I cannot see the benefit of Bluetooth on a toothbrush but I’ve managed to pair it with Alexa and it now operates independently of me except on Saturdays when Alexa has the day off.It’s a lot lighter than my old Oral B and the charging light is a lot less bright which does mean I’ll have to turn on the bathroom light now.Hey ho, a price well worth paying. You won’t go wrong with this toothbrush.

After trying multiple cheaper alternatives to the Oral-B brand replacement toothbrush heads, I advise to stick with the brand-name in this case. There is a small hole on the back of the toothbrush head that in cheaper alternatives is placed lower than it is on the Oral-B brand toothbrush heads. For me, this caused a lot of irritation on the corners of my mouth as the internal mechanism would vibrate through that hole too much and tear apart the skin on the corners of my mouth. I do not recommend anything but the brand name.

This is my first time using a spin brush.  I got it from the recommendation of my dentist.I love it!  Easy to use, cleans thoroughly,  has a timer to let you know when it's time to change quadrants and flashes red if you are pressing too hard.  Charge lasts a few weeks. No batteries needed.  Replacement heads easy to chamge. Would recommend.

reviewTitle: I recommend ordering from "Mitch Mel Corp Same Day Shipping" to ensure authenticity
reviewDescription: They're exactly what you expect, replacement brush heads for Oral-B electric toothbrushes. I recently had to return a pack of them because they were counterfeit and was wondering what I could do to prevent making the same mistake again. I saw a few reviews saying that the brush heads they received from "Mitch Mel Corp Same Day Shipping" were the genuine article, so I decided to take a chance and order from them. The text on the package the heads came in was in German, which I found a little odd, but with the help of some online guides and videos, I was able to determine that the heads I received were, in fact, authentic. I'll definitely be ordering from them again the next time I need more.

reviewTitle: Works great for a low end brush. Good value.
reviewDescription: Arrived promptly.  Easy set up and good directions. Could be sturdier but works well. I don't need a brush with a lit of extras this model fits my needs. Dentist recommended.

reviewTitle: it saved me a trip to the dentist
reviewDescription: I was going to visit my dentist to have my teeth clean. I didn't realize how bad my tar build up were until I checked my teeth. So, I bought this to give it a try. I could not believe they actually remove all my tar build up at least 98 percent. Just amazing. Well, it saved me a trip to the dentist office.

Aside from being in German packaging, the brush heads look exactly the same as the ones I've purchased from the store. I also got them much faster than anticipated, which was nice. I've already replaced my old brush head with a new one and they look/feel/perform like you'd expect from a brush head so they seem legit, authentic Oral-B brush heads. These fit both the Pro 1000 and Pro 1500.I would purchase again considering I can get a four-pack for a good price, as the ones I've purchased from the store usually only come in packs of two and are a little pricier.EDIT: I've purchased these a second time and the packaging is written in Arabic maybe? I guess I got lucky the second time because the brush heads still perform exactly the same as the last ones I had. Some people seem to be having issues with these but so far I've been lucky and got legit brush heads.
Items were delivered ahead of schedule and packaged well. Quality is great!! Will buy more of the same from Amazon!!
Nice product but expensive

Quality seems ok, but the heads I received are not white as indicated in the description.  They are black.  Not thrilled with them but too much hassle to send them back.  And yes, I realize there are much bigger problems in the world, but just wanted other buyers to be aware.
Exactly what they say.
Brush rotates well does well in getting between teeth
Don't like the built in timer that's supposed to guide you to brush parts of your mouth

I've been using these for my brush for a couple of years. I'm pleased. They fit my unit, clean my teeth well. The price is a bit high, but the quality seems to be there. I change my head every 6 months (with my cleaning) so this 4 pack will last a couple of years for me.
Terrible quality all round, heads falling off. Don't buy!!

reviewTitle: these are grey market,i don't know what language was on packaging,i assume its what i ordered
reviewDescription: didn't expect to buy a product from another country

reviewTitle: Received Knockoff. Not Original. Cardboard packaging written in Slavic.
reviewDescription: Received Knockoff. Not Original. Cardboard packaging written in Slavic.

reviewTitle: Very cheap feeling. Only lasts like a week
reviewDescription: It felt like it their lowest end of their toothbrush heads
The product has packaging in Turkish rather than English.
Did not fit my oral b sonic care electric toothbrush as described.
Sorry, but had to throw these away. They feel like they would take the enamel off your teeth.

reviewTitle: Doesn't match picture. Foreign rip off looking. Not even sure if its legit.

reviewDescription: Every after 2 full days charging, it would not turn on

reviewTitle: Blood on package + from another country
reviewDescription: The first thing I noticed was everything was in a different language. Then I noticed dried blood.

reviewTitle: Open and dirty not oral b’s fault
reviewDescription: Was open and dirty
I’m not sure if this is a genuine product, but it is not the same packaging as in the photo. The packaging is in Turkish.
Recieved strange version of alleged product, entirely in Turkish or Arabic.

reviewTitle: not real knock offs, open package
reviewDescription: not real knock offs, open package

reviewTitle: Shut on and off as I’m using it
reviewDescription: The product works great however shut off by itself to her three times as I’m using it

reviewTitle: This is not real oral B product
reviewDescription: Received this in German, so I don't think it's American product and it's not the same quality. Disappointed.

reviewTitle: They were terrible they lasted only a day or two before I had to throw them away!!!!
reviewDescription: Brushing my teeth. They certainly were not Oral B’s usual quality.

reviewTitle: Did not work after one use
reviewDescription: This toothbrush would not accept a charge after 1st use.
Oh my gosh. I have several crowns these toothbrushes are so rough I feel like the loosened my crowns. Just horrible do not buy
These brush heads are clearly knock offs. Not true Oral-B product. Do not buy
Not from the USA.No English on either side of package except for Oral-B Cross Action Clean Maximizer in the front.Cannot evaluate item as I am considering returning it.
The firmness of the bristles is gone within just two weeks and the tips of the bristles also start to discolor suggesting the brush needs to be replaced. Definitely not worth it!
This product is not for US distribution. The packaging is 100% foreign language.

reviewTitle: Very bad product. These bristles are of no use. Don't clean your teeth well
reviewDescription: Very bad product. Dont waste your money. It doesnt come anywhere close to original Orabl B bristles which clean your teeth thoroughly
The package has no English instruction.  All languages are foreign.  Unused.
The product appeared to be what I ordered, but the packaging did not include English. There were at least 3 languages, but not any I can read.
These brush heads stop spinning after a week's use.
These replacement heads go bad after a few uses and do not make your mouth feel clean no matter how long you brush.  Waste of my money.
I don't know where these came from but they are not what I ordered.  All foreign language on the package.  Can't read any of it.  See the photos.

Bought this because my dentist advised me to buy one. Was a good price and good product but motor only lasted a little under a year so now I'm brushing my teeth with an eletric toothbrush that dosnt work.

reviewTitle: I was sent the wrong color of toothbrush head
reviewDescription: The product is fine, however I was sent the wrong color of toothbrush head.  Now have 3 more black toothbrush heads to go with my white toothbrush

The product is really nice especially for our being my first electric toothbrush. My biggest complaint is this that the toothbrush heads get moldy even after taking them off and rinsing them after each use.  I have gone through too may of the heads since buying the toothbrush.
I thought these were the ones with soft plastic flossers but they're not.  These just have bristles and don't seem to last as long

I’m a bit dismayed that I got a foreign version of these brushes.  I’m not sure of the language but I wish I’d been informed beforehand.  I am sure they’re fine but they don’t look like the brushes I’m used to so that’s disappointing.

reviewTitle: Good brushes with different color base
reviewDescription: Brushes work fine.  But did not expect the plastic base to be black instead of white like the handle.
They work fine and appear to be genuine Oral-B, just annoying that I ordered one color and received a different one. That's the price you pay for Amazon I guess.

reviewTitle: Oral B Tooth Brush heads a bust!
reviewDescription: Disappointed for the 2nd time with these tooth brush heads! Not nearly as firm as I anticipated when I ordered

reviewTitle: They shipped a black toothbrush…that is not what was represented.
reviewDescription: Good quality, thought I was getting a white toothbrush. It was black. No bueno.

reviewTitle: Wrong brush heads - Thought this was for the Oral-B Pro 3000
reviewDescription: The purchase of my Oral B Pro 3000 toothbrush showed these as an add on.  I should have checked better which next time I will.  I assumed wrongly that if amazon showed these brush heads to add on to purchase would be the correct brush heads for the toothbrush I was buying.  Unfortunately I started to open the package so now I assume it can not be returned.  Bummer will be now buying the brush heads for the Pro 3000
Works well, looks nice at night - if you want to attach them to a wooden structure they do not include anything for that purpose
Ordered replacement heads for electric toothbrush.  Received promptly, well packaged.  Good price
They are individually wrapped - yes they are made in another country as entire package is in another language. But, seem like good quality.
n/a
I liked the feel of my teeth after brushing with the Cross Action and I can't find a dislike to report.Thank you
Thank you
not sure which of the toothbrush heads i got, but it's pretty firm. fits my oral b toothbrush perfectly
These were the best price for the amout I recieved.
It does the job well and for the price paid it's a bagain.
First one lasted maybe a month before the head got all wobbly and loose, second one lasted maybe 2 weeks
The oral b logo rubs off with your finger right out of the package. They are very noisy not like the one's you buy in the store.
The heads are priced well. However, after 3 uses, the head broke and tore up my lip. The next head I tried did not spin. These are knock off heads and certainly not "Oral B" brand. Buyer beware!
First Oral B brush head failed to rotate in 10 days, second was loose and noisy in a week.  Returned and bought original Oral B brushes local.  Working fine on rechargeable and battery units

reviewTitle: I guess you get what you pay for after all
reviewDescription: These brush heads appear to be either rejected by quality control, or knock offs. I compared the brush heads with Oral B originals and the bristle density of the ones I got via Amazon was so low, that I very much doubt Oral B would have accepted the lot from the manufacturer. I returned them for a refund.
I have been an Oral-B user for 10 years now.  This new set has me thinking of switching.  I constantly feel my teeth are dirty.  I find myself just brushing manually, seems to work better.

reviewTitle: Only  2 brush heads were present.  Terrible experience as a result.
reviewDescription: The toothbrush package was opened in the shipping box and 2 brushes were missing.  It was a terrible experience.

reviewTitle: Not as good as the cross action heads
reviewDescription: I thought these would be better but I'll stick with the cross action. These don't remove plague from your teeth like cross action does. They also turn white, signaling a change of head, about twice as fast.

reviewTitle: Do not purchase - Gray market product
reviewDescription: This is not from Oral B. The back label (see above) looks sketchy AF, and I'm quite curious why there is a sticker over part of the label specifying that the product is new. Returning!
2 of the 4 arrived broken. I'll just buy these at physical retails from now on.
Brush heads worked as advertised, came in an "Oral-B" box Distributed by P&Gamble
I've only used it twice and it works great. I was expecting a timer to go off in 2 minutes but I probably need to read the instructions over.
I like the ones with the yellow flossers on them better. With peace and love.
Todo está perfecto!!👍🏻👍🏻
I just bought it--easy to use. Otherwise it does what it's supposed to do--scrubs my teeth!!
useful at a fair price
I like it just fine.  I used them for my Oral B toothbrush.
Very comfortable large heads that are noticeable better than the generic brands. Still overpriced and not an attractive designed.
good product

reviewTitle: It does what it’s needed to do
reviewDescription: The price is right also it does what’s it’s required to do. I’m satisfied

I previously said I had received a different version than I ordered. Although there are physical differences between what I received and expected, I found markings identifying this as the correct item. I suspect it was an earlier production, but it was as described and I'm satisfied.
It’s a toothbrush head. It works.  Nothing more to say really.
Use this product regularly and fine this price is more than reasonable.
Brushes the teeth good. What don’t like is it feels like I am sticking a drill on my teeth.

reviewTitle: Label is not in English, but the product works sufficiently.
reviewDescription: I was a little off put by the fact that the label was written in German. I was not sure if I had mistakenly ordered the wrong item. Fortunately, even though I was unable to read the label; the product was exactly what I needed. The brush head fits my toothbrush and works well.
You need to use this item for a while to see how it performs. These brushes have bristles a little longer and stiffer than the original ones so they feel different.
Easy install and disposal

reviewTitle: Product box may come in different languages
reviewDescription: Product details on the box were in Turkish for some reason. Good value for amount of brush heads but being able to read the details would’ve been a nice touch.

reviewTitle: Good product but lower priced elsewhere.
reviewDescription: Durable and well made product. But much better prices are available elsewhere.
Purchase experience was easy .
These brushes are pretty sturdy. I would say you will probalby need a new brush every 4 months. They feel great in your mouth and are easy to attach. I just with they had black ones.
I bought these for my son. He said he likes them better than the original head that came with toothbrush.

reviewTitle: Oral B is great, will not buy the no name brand brush heads again!!
reviewDescription: Oral B cleans your teeth better than any other brand!!!

reviewTitle: Great value for the price compared with buying in a retail store
reviewDescription: These work great and are very durable. Much more affordable to purchase online here rather than in a retail store!

This time I ordered the "Pack de 4" option, and I got the ones with the blue brushes in the middle, i.e. the look is closer to the "original" heads. The packaging also has english on it (looks like the main language of the packaging) and other languages. I'm posting some pics of the package. I have had zero issues, the brush heads fit my oral-B well, no problem! For the money, I am happy with purchases and see nothing that leads me to believe these are below standard. Be sure to check the bottom of your device to be sure you are ordering the correct brushes.

reviewTitle: Ordered 4 white, got 4 black. They work fine.
reviewDescription: Ordered 4 white, got 4 black. They work fine.

Like most people who use electronic toothbrushes, we all know how expensive the replacement brush heads are. So, again like most people you start searching around for cheaper options. I came across these “Oral-B” Cross Action brush heads which had an awesome value. Seemed to good to be true but I figured I would just see for myself. Once the package arrived the first thing I noticed was that there were a LOT of different languages on the back of the package as well as the misspelling of Sonic Complete in English (spelled Complate). Once I opened the package I noticed that those colored plastic rings on the bottom of the brush heads were already installed on the brush heads. If you’ve purchase Oral-B brush heads before you know that the colored plastic rings are loose in the package and it’s up to you to install them on the heads. Just to make sure I wasn’t crazy I went to my local Target and purchased a package of Oral-B Cross Action toothbrush heads to compare. Upon comparing the two, one difference is the plastic the heads come in. The ones from Target were a softer plastic while the ones from Amazon were a much harder plastic. Also, the imprint on the plastic from the ones at Target are stamped “PFT” while the ones from Amazon are stamped “PET.” Moving on looking at the bristles you can see that they are different as well. Another note is the Oral-B print on the neck of the head. The ones from Amazon had completely come off after only about a week or two of daily use. The one from Target did not seem to have been affected. While the ones from Amazon are a great value, know you are NOT getting a genuine product from Oral-B. And it’s important to think about exactly how they are made and with what (i.e. chemicals, etc) that could be harmful to your teeth and health. Considering the great value these replacement heads are, I think I will pay the extra money for a genuine product from Oral-B for peace of mind. With all that being said these ones from Amazon do seem to work and perform as an electronic toothbrush head should.

reviewTitle: Doesn’t work after a few brushes
reviewDescription: When I first install these, they work for a few days then stop rotating properly. The first head that came with my brush lasted a while, but these break quickly. After they break it’s like brushing with regular brushes.

reviewTitle: 2 stars because I got 2 brushes but paid for 4
reviewDescription: The product is swell, but I didn’t love that I purchased a 4-pack and only received a 2-pack. My teeth and I will not stand for this heinous injustice. I take my oral hygiene seriously.
Listing indicated the color was white, but product I received was black.  Works the same so I will keep, but my toothbrush is white so I don’t lkke having the head black.

reviewTitle: Not made for the US market
reviewDescription: I sent this package back. The package said it is made in Germany for the Turkish market. I really didn't know if the brushes were the same as the ones for my handle. Really did not appreciate that they did not disclose that these are not for the US market.

These brushes are abrasive and not actually by oral b. If you go from using an original oral b head, you’ll notice how coarse these fibers are. They almost scratch my palate. I have dropped my toothbrush many times and the original oral b heads never break, but this one broke right away. The head came off the neck. Not going to order again

reviewTitle: Product labeled in Turkish and Kurdish
reviewDescription: Looks suspicious! I verified with Oral B that product is authentic.  It came in very worn packaging labeled in Turkish, Kurdish and another language I don't recognize.  Worst part is that packaging is worn and close to expiration date.
It looks like it will fit but it’s in a completely different language.

reviewTitle: Not a product for US sales
reviewDescription: Other people mention German packaging.  I got the exotic model!  My packaging has Turkish, Russian, Uzbek, and a fourth language I couldn't identify.  I won the knockoff lottery!Haven't opened or used them yet, but already I'm underwhelmed.  I got what I paid for.
Product is not described as black and pictures show white. Pretty irritating, but not worth the trouble of trying to return them. Ugh.

reviewDescription: May have to return all 4 from pack.  First 2 opened were defective.  Brush head loose on the first.  Second does not stay on the base.  I should still be on the first one but got tired of it shaking around while brushing.  Second one comes off during brushing.

It showed up with what appears to he Turkish language written all over it. There is really no way to know if it's a legit product or not. What you pay is what you get but I feel it was misleading what I received vs the picture they put in the listing.

I have bought these from amazon a number of times without issue. This time, the brush heads seem to be loose and the bristles are flimsy. The looseness of the brush head causes a pinch point so I am throwing them away. Unfortunately I am beyond the return period.

The seller did mention the brushes "Fits ALL Oral-B electric toothbrushes except Pulsonic" well I don't have a Pulsonic and they didn't fit. Seller doesn't allow returns so double check your product and replacement requirements.

reviewTitle: Gives me a headache but gets my teeth really clean.
reviewDescription: I've used a Sonicare Electric Toothbrush for YEARS. Recently purchased (from Amazon) a new replacement Sonicare but I didn't feel it got my teeth clean. Dentist had recommended Oral-B so thought I'd give it a try. I love how clean it gets my teeth. However, the vibration is so strong that it gives me a headache. Like one of the reviews said - it vibrates like a jack hammer. I called my dentist and they haven't heard of the Oral-B being so strong as to give people headaches. I use the sensitive (feather) setting. I've never been able to use it for more than 45 seconds. It seems to help if I open my mouth really wide. Other than send it back, does the company have any recommendations.

reviewTitle: Easy to replace and clean well
reviewDescription: People use their toothbrush heads for too long and replacing them is really important to how they clean. We like to buy the multi-pack so we can replace easily.
A very strong brush and larger than some.
This is my first replacements of my OralB toothbrush heads. These work great!!

These cross action heads seem to do the best job of cleaning our teeth out of the several styles available. They are easy to use and are holding up pretty well so far. None of these last a long time, but I think these will still be cleaning effectively at the end of their suggested three month life. One thing we do is soak them in denture cleaner at least twice a week. It seems to clean out the mechanisms and reduce the noise they make when running after a cleaning. These have really reduced the plaque levels and have noticeably brightened our teeth. As coffee and tea drinkers, the stain reduction performance was a welcome bonus to my wife and me.
Very durable and great value pack!

reviewTitle: It has some get up and go!
reviewDescription: My Phillips sonic was limping along after 1.5 years, so I decided to try the Oral B.  Holy Moly!  What a difference.  It revs up like a hot rod, but you can adjust the intensity.  This red light kept coming on which I found annoying.  I finally read the instructions and the red light indicates you are putting too much pressure on the brush.  Now, no more red light.  I like this feature.  I’m not using any of the phone bells and whistles.  I just wanted a good electric toothbrush and feel as if I got that.  I would buy this model again when the time comes.

Yes, I hate to floss. As much as I nag my teen to do it, I am just as bad. I don't know why I never noticed this flosser before. I went from string floss to the little plastic things to this and the angle makes it easy to get in and out without cutting off the circulation of your fingers or gagging with your fist in your mouth. My dentist recommended it so yay!

reviewTitle: Oral B Cross Action Electric Toothbrush replacement head refill 4 count
reviewDescription: I purchase these replacement head for my electric toothbrush and there are 4 heads.

Normally I would purchase this in the store, but of late you have to have a store associate get this for you, and store associates are not always available. Ordering this from Prime cost no more than if I purchased it in the store, and because I have been using these brushes with my Oral B toothbrush for several years, I know that they fit correctly and work well.

It’s a great buy since you get more brushes with the price you pay in comparison to other sellers.  I compared their quality and the physical appearances of those to other one I had bought  from the manufacturer website, and the only difference was the language that was used on the packaging. They came quick and had different color rings to differentiate them ( as expected)

reviewTitle: My dental tech praises my dental hygiene with every visit.
reviewDescription: These are great replacement heads. They're a little on the pricey side, but they last 6 months each before I replace them (as directed by the instructions). Almost zero plaque buildup on my teeth using these heads.

reviewDescription: Use these constantly and they hold up for, I dunno, maybe 3 months? A little on the expensive side for the number included, but that is the way with all of these types no matter the brand. Like printer companies, they make their money on the consumables.
These are a great replacement for my electric toothbrush, the only difference from my last pack is that the bristles are mostly green and not blue but they work the same.

These are the BEST toothbrushes I have ever used.  It is a cross brush style and my teeth feel as if I just had a cleaning at the dentist every time I brush.  I ordered another Pro 1000 electric brush and refills for my husband.  You will see a real difference in One brushing

reviewTitle: Great value, packaging is also in another language
reviewDescription: I compared them with the much more expensive ones I bought from the local supermarket here in America, and these appear to be legitimate Oral B made replacements. The only thing unusual is that much of the language on the package is written in Polish in addition to English. I'm guessing they sell these for less of a mark-up in Europe than they do in America (the retail price of these in the USA is ridiculous), but that's just a guess. I have been using one for a few weeks, and it works and cleans just like the ones I've bought from the store.
They are so can be changed when needed.
Good brush heads for a good electric toothbrush.  I usually get four months (not just three) out of each brush head.

I've had my Oral-B tooth brush for a little over two years. Previously I had bought generic Oral-B brush heads because they were a way better deal but my teeth didn't feel as clean when I used them. Some reviews said that these brush heads were a knockoffs. I think they are the real deal, except they may come in a different language. Mine were in Turkish.

reviewTitle: Pro Tip: This goes in your mouth
reviewDescription: Will not cut though anything thicker than lite mayonnaise with our sawing or using and actual knife.
The replacement toothbrush heads fit fine but I was sent black when I ordered white, looks a little weird on my white handle.
Works great
It's not this brushes fault. It's those damn Swedish fish. Why does Canada make and export a Swedish product??
Otherwise it was a good product at a good price point
Worth the money

reviewTitle: The product I received is labelled in German
reviewDescription: I can't read anything on the label because it is all German. The product is advertised in English. It would have been rather helpful to be able to read what's on the box.
The package arrived on time, which now with amazon is a plus.  We have started using the replacement heads and they seem to be working great.  I=
The product works which is why it got a four rating.  All the text with the exception of Oral-B is in German.  I am keeping it as they work.
Works well, but are softer than the original design. And like someone else pointed out, there was a fair amount German printing on the package Looks like it’s a genuine Oral B product
These heads did not fit properly and came off while brushing. May have been a faulty batch, but will not buy again. Went to Walgreens and purchased them.

This might be a great product but the advertising says: “fits all Oral-B electric toothbrushes except Pulsonic”. This is not correct. I have an “Oral B cross-action”  electric toothbrush (not a Pulsonic) and it did not fit. Not even close.  I had to return it.
Do not buy these. The packaging is for floss action but they are actually not! We used them because we were going on a trip and could not rtn

reviewTitle: Oral B Cross Action Electric Toothbrush Replacement Brush Heads Refill, 4Count
reviewDescription: Fall off my Oral B tooth Brush!  .Do not recommend.
I bought the toothbrush on 6/2/2021 and it stop working around 8/5/2021. I charged for a whole day but it only worked for a few seconds and dead.
Received package and the toothbrush package (not delivery package) has been opened.
I don't know what it is about this brush -- is it the size or the stiffness? But my it's very harsh on my gums and I have cuts on my gums.  It's painful to use.I will not be purchasing these again.
This item was not compatible with my Electric toothe brush, as there description said it would.

reviewTitle: Easy to use but get insurance!!!
reviewDescription: It’s like Viagra…it works for a little while…well…but get insurance because you can’t rely on its longevity!!!
I’ve ordered refill heads before without a problem but for whatever reason, these heads don’t stay on.
